about_the_game:
🌌 Embark on Humanity’s Greatest Journey to the Moon

In Lunaris, step into the role of an astronaut tasked with navigating the most ambitious space missions ever undertaken. From the thunderous lift-off of the Saturn V rocket to the final step onto the lunar surface, Lunaris offers an immersive, realistic simulation of NASA's Apollo program. Experience the triumphs and challenges of space exploration as you venture beyond Earth and leave your legacy on the Moon.

Game Features:

🚀 Authentic Spacecraft Simulation

Control the key components of the Apollo missions with incredible precision:

  • Pilot the Saturn V rocket, Command Module, and Lunar Module, each designed with utmost attention to historical detail.

  • Follow authentic mission procedures, manage spacecraft systems, and deal with unexpected spaceflight challenges.

🌍 Historical Campaign

Relive the most iconic Apollo missions:

  • Experience the first Moon landing of Apollo 11, the dramatic rescue of Apollo 13, and the last lunar expedition of Apollo 17.

  • Navigate the evolving technologies and risks of the space program as you advance through the missions.

🛠️ Creative & Challenge Modes

Test your skills in new ways:

  • What-If Scenarios: Explore alternative histories by facing unexpected mission failures or changing key decisions.

  • Custom Missions: Design your own lunar explorations, challenging your planning and piloting abilities.

🌌 Visually Stunning & Immersive Audio

Lose yourself in the wonder of space:

  • Beautifully rendered spacecraft, lunar landscapes, and Earth views bring the space program to life.

  • Recreated mission audio enhances the experience, letting you hear the sounds of Apollo from the cockpit to the Moon.

👨‍🚀 Tailored Gameplay Modes

Play the way you want:

  • Explorer Mode: Simplified mechanics for a more relaxed, visually-driven experience.

  • Simulation Mode: Full control over spacecraft systems, offering an authentic, complex spaceflight experience.

Why Lunaris?

Lunaris is more than just a game—it’s a journey to the stars. Whether you’re a space exploration fan, a lover of history, or a simulation enthusiast, this title offers an engaging and educational experience in the world of Apollo missions. Take command of the spacecraft, explore the Moon, and make your mark in humanity’s history.

Your Legacy Awaits

Are you ready to leave your mark on the Moon? Lunaris challenges you to relive the Apollo missions and take the helm of one of mankind's greatest achievements. From liftoff to landing, your mission awaits.

🚀 Step into the cosmos – your journey begins now in Lunaris!

name: Lunaris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k 3.5 GHz /AMD Ryzen 3 1300X 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: ntel Core i7-4790 3.6 GHz /AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Ti / Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Embark on humanity’s greatest journey to the Moon with Lunaris. Take on the role of an astronaut navigating NASA’s Apollo missions, from the roaring launch of Saturn V to stepping on the lunar surface. Experience the triumphs, challenges, and legacy of space exploration in this immersive simulator.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish
*languages with full audio support
